title: From landfill to luxury: the brand that transforms rescued materials into premium fashion
text:
Sustainable accessory brand Elvis & Kresse rescues materials, like decommissioned fire hose, that would otherwise be thrown away, and gives them a beautiful new life.

There can't be many fashion and homeware brands that find inspiration for new product lines at rubbish dumps. Yet this is the ethos behind Elvis & Kresse, a company built on the concept of sustainable luxury in its purest form. In the hands of its founders, husband-and-wife team Kresse Wesling and James Henrit (aka Elvis), discarded materials destined for landfill are transformed into beautiful and desirable products, from handbags, luggage and belts to interior accessories.
